titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2486) to authorize the National Weather Service to conduct research and development, training, and outreach activities relating to tropical cyclone inland forecasting improvement, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-558, by Mr. Diaz-Balart.

It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Science now printed in the bill (H.Rept. 107-495).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 186.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 473.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/9/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 2486 (development of an inland flood forecasting and warning system).
